property.caption: Slider Type
property.description: Type of slider

property.caption: From
property.description: Attribute holding the value for the left handle (or for single handle)

property.caption: To
property.description: Attribute holding the value for the right handle

property.caption: Min (Default)
property.description: Default slider minimum value

property.caption: Min
property.description: Slider minimum value from an attribute

property.caption: Max (Default)
property.description: Default slider maximum value

property.caption: Max
property.description: Slider maximum value from an attribute

property.caption: Step (Default)
property.description: Default slider step.

property.caption: Step
property.description: Slider step

property.caption: Limit From Movement
property.description: If true, allows the From handle's movement to be limited

property.caption: From Minimum (Default)
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the minimum allowed value for the From handle.

property.caption: From Minimum
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the minimum allowed value for the From handle based on an attribute.

property.caption: From Maximum (Default)
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the maximum allowed value for the From handle.

property.caption: From Maximum
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the maximum allowed value for the From handle based on an attribute.

property.caption: Show From Shadow
property.description: If true, highlights the allowed zone based for the From handle

property.caption: Limit To Movement
property.description: If true, allows the To handle's movement to be limited

property.caption: To Minimum (Default)
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the minimum allowed value for the To handle.

property.caption: To Minimum
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the minimum allowed value for the To handle based on an attribute.

property.caption: To Maximum (Default)
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the maximum allowed value for the To handle.

property.caption: To Maximum
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the maximum allowed value for the To handle based on an attribute.

property.caption: Show To Shadow
property.description: If true, highlights the allowed zone based for the To handle

property.caption: Show Grid
property.description: Enables grid of values.

property.caption: Prefix
property.description: Set prefix for values. Will be set up right before the number

property.caption: Postfix
property.description: Set postfix for values. Will be set up after the number

property.caption: Disabled
property.description: If true, makes the slider disabled.

property.caption: Disabled via attribute
property.description: Optional, set's slider disabled property based on attribute (true = disabled, false = enabled)

property.caption: Visible
property.description: If true, makes the slider visible.

property.caption: Visible via attribute
property.description: Optional, set's slider visibility property based on attribute (true = visible, false = hidden)

property.caption: Prettify
property.description: If true, improves readability of long numbers. 1000 â†’ 1 000

property.caption: On Value Change Microflow
property.description: Run this microflow when a slider value changes
